Group A, characterized by their brown hair, has the unique ability to communicate telepathically amongst themselves. Group B, conversely, lacks this skill. Describe the interactions and communication dynamics between these groups using code words derived from the secret language of a close-knit community. Ensure that the story conveys the telepathic ability of group A and the lack thereof in group B.
